STORE_ID, SUBMIT_NUM, TAMPON_VD_SHELF_POS, TG_POS, WET_VD_SHELF_POS, syncflag, SEND_STORE_TYPE ) values (#{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{conflictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aduShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aduVdShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkStoreType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityApproResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorPosId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbLastUpdSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diffContant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diffType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djListPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dryVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endExecuteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groundingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gtExpVerfCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hjListPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promApproResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provApproResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reimStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startExecuteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tamponVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wetVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syncflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendStoreType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into cx_gt_reim (ROW_ID, CREATED, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPD, LAST_UPD_BY, MODIFICATION_NUM, CONFLICT_ID, ADU_SHELF_NUM, ADU_VD_SHELF_NUM, COLUMN_STATUS, DB_LAST_UPD, DJ_CHECK_NUM, DJ_SEND_NUM, DRY_SHELF_NUM, DRY_VD_SHELF_NUM, HJ_CHECK_NUM, HJ_SEND_NUM, LAST_MON_SALES, REIM_TIME, STORE_TYPE_FLG, TAMPON_SHELF_NUM, TAMPON_VD_SHELF_NUM, TG_CHECK_NUM, TG_SEND_NUM, WET_SHELF_NUM, WET_VD_SHELF_NUM, ADU_VD_SHELF_POS, APPLY_NUM, APPLY_PHONE, APPLY_POS_ID, APPRO_STATUS, CHECK_PROBLEM, CHECK_STORE_TYPE, CITY_APPRO_RESULT, CREATOR_POS_ID, DB_LAST_UPD_SRC, DIFF_CONTANT, DIFF_TYPE, DJ_LIST_POS, DRY_VD_SHELF_POS, END_EXECUTE_TIME, EXPENSE_TYPE, GROUNDING_TYPE, GT_EXP_VERF_CODE, HJ_LIST_POS, POSITION_INFO, PROM_APPRO_RESULT, PROV_APPRO_RESULT, REIM_STATUS, START_EXECUTE_TIME, STORE_ID, SUBMIT_NUM, TAMPON_VD_SHELF_POS, TG_POS, WET_VD_SHELF_POS, syncflag, SEND_STORE_TYPE) values
(#{item.rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastUpd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.conflictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.aduShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.aduVdShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.columnStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.dbLastUpd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.djCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.djSendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.dryShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.dryVdShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.hjCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.hjSendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.lastMonSales,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reimTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.storeTypeFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.tamponShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.tamponVdShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.tgCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.tgSendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.wetShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.wetVdShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.aduVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.applyPosId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.approStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.checkProblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.checkStoreType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cityApproResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creatorPosId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dbLastUpdSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.diffContant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.diffType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.djListPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dryVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.endExecuteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groundingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gtExpVerfCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hjListPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.positionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.promApproResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.provApproResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reimStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startExecuteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.submitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tamponVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tgPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.wetVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.syncflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sendStoreType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select distinct a.id AcountId,a.name Name,cr.Gt_Exp_Verf_Code,cr.Row_Id ,cr.Store_Id,cr.LAST_UPD newTime, ifnull(cr.REIM_STATUS,'新建') Reim_Status,ifnull(cr.APPRO_STATUS,'新建' ) Approval_Status, a2.name as Systems from gk_employee e inner join gk_emp_postn ep on e.Id = ep.empId inner join gk_position p on p.Id = ep.positionId inner join gk_account_position ap on ep.positionId = ap.positionId inner join gk_account a on ap.accountId = a.Id inner join cx_gt_reim cr on a.intId = cr.STORE_ID left join gk_gt_reim_Temp tem on tem.reimId = cr.row_id left join gk_account a1 on a.parentid=a1.id left join gk_account a2 on a1.parentid=a2.id where p.wxtype in ('GT Store Clerk','GT Director','External GT Store Clerk') and ep.positionId=#{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and e.id = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cr.REIM_STATUS!='无效'
and ( (cr.APPRO_STATUS like '%已驳回' and tem.ApplyPosId=cr.Apply_Pos_Id ) or (cr.APPRO_STATUS ='新建' and cr.REIM_STATUS!='草稿' ) or (cr.APPRO_STATUS ='新建' and cr.REIM_STATUS ='草稿' and p.intId=tem.ApplyPosId ))
and cr.created like concat(#{dateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and cr.APPRO_STATUS like concat('%',#{approvalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (a.name like concat('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or cr.Gt_Exp_Verf_Code like concat('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') )
and a.name like concat('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by case when Approval_Status!='新建' and Approval_Status!='审批完成' then 1 when Reim_Status='草稿' then 2 when Reim_Status!='草稿' then 3 end asc, newTime desc

select a.ShopLevel,cr.SEND_STORE_TYPE as Store_Type,a.id AcountId,a.intId IntId,a.name Name,a.Province,a.City,a.District,a.Address,cr.Row_Id ,cr.Store_Id, cr.LAST_UPD newTime,ifnull(cr.REIM_STATUS,'新建') Reim_Status,ifnull(cr.APPRO_STATUS,'新建') Approval_Status,v1.par_ebs_name cityOffice, v2.par_ebs_name provinceOffice,a1.name as Dealers,a2.name as Systems ,crt.reimId as reimId from gk_account a inner join cx_gt_reim cr on a.intId = cr.STORE_ID inner join gk_org o1 on a.orgid=o1.id left join cx_wx_city_office_v v1 on o1.intid=v1.SUB_ROW_ID left join cx_wx_province_office_v v2 on o1.intid=v2.SUB_ROW_ID left join gk_account a1 on a.parentid=a1.id left join gk_account a2 on a1.parentid=a2.id left join gk_gt_reim_Temp crt on cr.row_Id=crt.reimId where cr.row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update cx_gt_reim
ROW_ID = #{updated.rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{updated.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{updated.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPD = #{updated.lastUpd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPD_BY = #{updated.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFICATION_NUM = #{updated.modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONFLICT_ID = #{updated.conflictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADU_SHELF_NUM = #{updated.aduShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADU_VD_SHELF_NUM = #{updated.aduVdShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COLUMN_STATUS = #{updated.columnStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
DB_LAST_UPD = #{updated.dbLastUpd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DJ_CHECK_NUM = #{updated.djCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DJ_SEND_NUM = #{updated.djSendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DRY_SHELF_NUM = #{updated.dryShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DRY_VD_SHELF_NUM = #{updated.dryVdShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HJ_CHECK_NUM = #{updated.hjCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HJ_SEND_NUM = #{updated.hjSendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MON_SALES = #{updated.lastMonSales,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REIM_TIME = #{updated.reimTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STORE_TYPE_FLG = #{updated.storeTypeFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
TAMPON_SHELF_NUM = #{updated.tamponShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TAMPON_VD_SHELF_NUM = #{updated.tamponVdShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TG_CHECK_NUM = #{updated.tgCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TG_SEND_NUM = #{updated.tgSendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WET_SHELF_NUM = #{updated.wetShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WET_VD_SHELF_NUM = #{updated.wetVdShelfNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADU_VD_SHELF_POS = #{updated.aduVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_NUM = #{updated.applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_PHONE = #{updated.applyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_POS_ID = #{updated.applyPosId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPRO_STATUS = #{updated.approStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_PROBLEM = #{updated.checkProblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_STORE_TYPE = #{updated.checkStoreType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_APPRO_RESULT = #{updated.cityApproResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR_POS_ID = #{updated.creatorPosId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_LAST_UPD_SRC = #{updated.dbLastUpdSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIFF_CONTANT = #{updated.diffContant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIFF_TYPE = #{updated.diffType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DJ_LIST_POS = #{updated.djListPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRY_VD_SHELF_POS = #{updated.dryVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_EXECUTE_TIME = #{updated.endExecuteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPENSE_TYPE = #{updated.expenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUNDING_TYPE = #{updated.groundingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GT_EXP_VERF_CODE = #{updated.gtExpVerfCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HJ_LIST_POS = #{updated.hjListPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_INFO = #{updated.positionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROM_APPRO_RESULT = #{updated.promApproResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROV_APPRO_RESULT = #{updated.provApproResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REIM_STATUS = #{updated.reimStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_EXECUTE_TIME = #{updated.startExecuteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_ID = #{updated.storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBMIT_NUM = #{updated.submitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAMPON_VD_SHELF_POS = #{updated.tamponVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TG_POS = #{updated.tgPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WET_VD_SHELF_POS = #{updated.wetVdShelfPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
syncflag = #{updated.syncflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SEND_STORE_TYPE = #{updated.sendStoreType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ROW_ID=#{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cr.Gt_Exp_Verf_Code,cr.STORE_ID as Store_Id,cr.SUBMIT_NUM as Submit_Number, date_format(cr.REIM_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as Reim_Time,cr.REIM_STATUS as Reim_Status,cr.DIFF_CONTANT as Diffrent_Contant, cr.APPRO_STATUS as Approval_Status,cr.GROUNDING_TYPE as Grounding_Type,cr.DRY_SHELF_NUM as Dry_Shelf_Number, cr.DRY_VD_SHELF_NUM as Dry_Vinda_Shelf_Number,cr.DRY_VD_SHELF_POS as Dry_Vinda_Shelf_Position,cr.WET_SHELF_NUM as Wet_Shelf_Number, cr.WET_VD_SHELF_NUM as Wet_Vinda_Shelf_Number,cr.WET_VD_SHELF_POS as Wet_Vinda_Shelf_Position,cr.TAMPON_SHELF_NUM as Tampon_Shelf_Number, cr.TAMPON_VD_SHELF_NUM as Tampon_Vinda_Shelf_Number,cr.TAMPON_VD_SHELF_POS as Tampon_Vinda_Shelf_Position,cr.ADU_SHELF_NUM as Adult_Shelf_Number, cr.ADU_VD_SHELF_NUM as Adult_Vinda_Shelf_Number,cr.ADU_VD_SHELF_POS as Adult_Vinda_Shelf_Position,cr.TG_SEND_NUM as TG_Send_Number,cr.TG_CHECK_NUM as TG_Check_Number,cr.TG_POS as TG_Position, cr.DJ_SEND_NUM as DJ_Send_Number,cr.DJ_CHECK_NUM as DJ_Check_Number,cr.DJ_LIST_POS as DJ_List_Position,cr.CHECK_PROBLEM as Check_Problem, cr.Start_Execute_Time,cr.End_Execute_Time,cr.send_Store_Type as Store_Type,e.name as Apply_name,cr.Apply_num Apply_number,cr.Position_Info as locationAddr, cr.HJ_CHECK_NUM as Shelf_Check_Number,cr.HJ_LIST_POS as Shelf_Position,cr.HJ_SEND_NUM as Shelf_Send_Number,cr.DIFF_TYPE as Diffrent_Type, cr.APPLY_POS_ID as Apply_Pos_Id,p.name as Apply_Pos_Name,STORE_TYPE_FLG as isStoreEq,CHECK_STORE_TYPE as StoreEq,cr.LAST_MON_SALES as Sales_Predict from cx_gt_reim cr left join gk_employee e on cr.Apply_num=e.login left join gk_position p on cr.Apply_Pos_Id=p.intid where cr.row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select cr.Row_Id, e.id empId,e.Name empName,'' as Apply_Num,e.photoUrl,p.Name positionName,DATE_FORMAT(cd.Appro_Datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createdTime,cd.Appro_Remark from (select Appro_Remark,DATE_FORMAT(Appro_Datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') Appro_Datetime,appro_emp_pos_id,appro_emp_id,Reim_Id from CX_GT_APRO_DTL union select Appro_Remark,DATE_FORMAT(Appro_Datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') Appro_Datetime,appro_emp_pos_id,appro_emp_id,Reim_Id from GK_COST_HISTORY_TEMP ) cd left join gk_employee e on cd.appro_emp_id=e.intid left join cx_gt_reim cr on cr.row_Id=cd.Reim_Id left join gk_position p on p.intid=cd.appro_emp_pos_id where cd.Reim_Id=#{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by createdTime asc
